title: RentEase
description: A platform connecting owners and tenants: owners manage properties, tenants access homes, pay rent, and raise issues. Simple living for both.

title: InstAuto
description: Instagram auto posting deployed on AWS EC2 instance which posts an image(AWS S3) every 24 hours which is edited, to add random quote from Quotes API, by Python PILLOW module.

title: Flipkart Price Traking App
description: Flipkart Price tracker which integrates a Mobile application to add links to the Cloud JSON storage provided by PantryCloud and get notified through a Webhoook in Discord Channel when the price of the product changes.

title: Discord Bot
description: Rogue Bot enhances Discord server interaction with features like moderation, utility, and fun commands. Its modular structure allows easy customization to suit server needs.

title: Simplest QR Code Generator
description: The Simplest QR Code Generator you will find, implemented with React JS and a public QR code API

title: ToDo List Web App
description: A Simple Todo List with Authentication, MongoDB implemented in ExpressJS and MongooseJS for MongoDB integration and CRUD operations on MongoDB
